def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_pair = all_close([x, y], ctx)
        check_all_dark = all([is_dark(dot, ctx) for dot in [x, y]])
        check_same_size = same_size([x, y], ctx)
        check_top = get_top([x, y], ctx)
        check_top_dark = is_dark(check_top, ctx)
        if (
            check_pair
            and check_all_dark
            and check_same_size
            and check_top_dark
        ):
            results.append([x, y])
    return results

def turn(state):
